ygData.subject: RE: I give up
ygData.msgSnippet: Poor Selection? Heehee. Interesting understatement. Humans especially. IE why can t I use the Grobb Cleaver dangit? I have one sitting in my bank right now
ygData.messageBody:
Poor Selection? Heehee. Interesting understatement. Humans especially. IE
why can't I use the Grobb Cleaver dangit? I have one sitting in my bank
right now and, goldarnit, it is annoying that I can't use it.

Secondly, why is there no way now for a Human SK to raise faction with
"thedead" the only way I knew how previously was to do the beetle eye quest
(I never actually got to try it before, see if I got laughed at or it
worked) but I was never able to get the box. Previously the box oculd be
given to me by a friend but now that it is no-drop there is no way for me to
raise faction.

Any Human SK or any SK for that matter know of a way for me to raise my
faction with "thedead" I want to be liked in my guild but I still have to
invis-undead past the ghouls and I can't get any DE SK quests because I am
hated.

Oh well, I'm logging in to kill some pecks so the outside guards like me
more. :)

see you all later,

virten


-----Original Message-----
From: Brian Hook [mailto:bhook@...]
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 3:42 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] I give up


So do you think that equipment quests are a viable alternative? I've
noticed that human (and DE?) SKs have a, uh, poor selection of quests =|

Brian
